Using the NeedIt Form

Use the NeedIt application to request services and goods from several departments.

  • Legal
  • Human Resources
  • Facilities

NeedIt Form Fields

  • For new NeedIt records, the Requested for field is pre-populated with your name. If you are opening a NeedIt request for someone else, you can change the value in the Requested for field.
  • The Requested for email field is automatically populated if you change the user in the Requested for field. You can change the Requested for email field value.
  • The choices in the What needed field depend on the value in the Request type field.
  • If the value in the What needed field is Other, the Other field appears. Use the Other field to add a few words about your request.
  • Use the calendar picker in the When needed field to set the due date for the NeedIt request.
  • Use the Short description and Description fields to provide more information about your request.
Note:

When creating NeedIt requests, the When needed date cannot be today or in the past.

Need More Help?

You can learn about form fields on the ServiceNow docs site.
